dc:title: Day After Day - January 1939
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An open letter to Peter Maurin, who is travelling, conveying the latest news from New York--visitors, news of strikes, conversations, and a needs list for the farm. Says their work is for a pluralist order, for the common good seeking concordances with others' points of view.
